name: Paradise Island
description:
b] The cover of the game was authorized by the artist 觉醒. [/b]

"Paradise Island" is a fast-paced fantasy-style strategy management game. In a randomly generated corner of the abyss, by consuming sanity in exchange for strength that does not belong to you. In the endless sea, create a new paradise to welcome the remnants of the old gods.

Features

Build a livable community that can meet the needs of the people, and then reject all the refugees who are to be rescued.

How to Play

  • Consume sensible values ​​in exchange for endless energy called "Yu Neng".
  • "Youneng" can be converted into electrical energy needed to run buildings through power plants.
  • Construct buildings by consuming energy.
  • Produce electricity by consuming electricity to meet people's needs.
  • When the electricity is exhausted, the production building will consume "energy" to maintain production. When "Phantom Energy" is insufficient, it will automatically consume reason to transform into Phantom Energy.
  • Sanity is to be continuously consumed. After satisfying the advanced needs of the people (blue mark), the character can gain a sense of accomplishment and restore the sanity of the character.
  • If the basic needs of the people cannot be met, the sane value will get negative feedback every time period.
  • The character is in anxious state, and only by refusing the refugees can the anxiety value be reduced. The lower the intellect, the faster the anxiety attacks. After the anxiety value is full, it will accelerate the consumption of intellect.
